## HtmlFormatOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HtmlFormatOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attrib](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.attrib.md) | <code>string</code> | HTML attrib name. |
|  [bg](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.bg.md) | <code>string</code> | Prefix string for background colors |
|  [bold](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.bold.md) | <code>string</code> | Bold format string |
|  [colors](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.colors.md) | <code>string[]</code> | Array of 16 color strings, in this order: black, red, green, yellow, blue, magenta, cyan, white, then repeated as bright versions. |
|  [delim](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.delim.md) | <code>string</code> | Delimiter between individual formatting terms (e.g. <code>;</code> for CSS rules or <code> </code> for CSS class names). |
|  [dim](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.dim.md) | <code>string</code> | Dimmed format string |
|  [fg](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.fg.md) | <code>string</code> | Prefix string for foreground colors |
|  [underline](./text-canvas.htmlformatopts.underline.md) | <code>string</code> | Underline format string |
